meanings.definition: Of or relating to the popliteus muscle.
meanings.sent1: The poplitei exercises helped strengthen my knee muscles.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her poplitei area after running.
meanings.sent3: The poplitei stretches made him feel like a flexible gymnast.
meanings.sent4: Her poplitei muscles were as sturdy as tree roots.
meanings.sent5: The poplitei movements were graceful and controlled.

meanings.definition: A group of muscles located behind the knee joint.
meanings.sent1: The poplitei support the knee during movement.
meanings.sent2: He injured his poplitei while playing soccer.
meanings.sent3: The poplitei group seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her poplitei were like hidden springs waiting to be activated.
meanings.sent5: The poplitei muscles worked together seamlessly during the dance routine.
